sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a pot over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic, grated ginger, and sliced Thai bird's eye chili, cook until fragrant. 3. Add thinly sliced beef sirloin and cook until browned. 4. Stir in beef broth, fish sauce, and soy sauce. Bring to a simmer. 5. Divide cooked rice noodles among serving bowls. 6. Ladle hot broth and beef over the noodles. 7. Top with bean sprouts, chopped green onion, chopped cilantro, and Thai basil leaves. 8. Serve hot with lime wedges on the side.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Beef Sirloin (500g, thinly sliced), Rice</ingredients> <meal_type/> <name>Thai Beef Noodle Soup</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Thinly slice beef sirloin. 2. Cook rice noodles. 3. Chop green onion and cilantro. 4. Slice Thai bird's eye chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3091d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afee</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
